chartbeat.title: NFL Football Scores - NFL Scoreboard - ESPN

nowFeed.headline: ESPN sources: 49ers and Eagles are working to finalize a trade that will send edge rusher Bryce Huff to San Francisco for a mid-round  pick. The trade cannot and would not be processed until after June 1. But both sides are working to make it happen, and Huff already has reworked his contract to help facilitate the trade. In San Francisco, Huff will be reunited with 49ers DC Robert Saleh, his former HC with the Jets.

authors.biography:
• ESPN NFL Insider
  • Joined ESPN in 2009
  • Former president of the Pro Football Writers of America and the author of four books

nowFeed.story: ESPN sources: 49ers and Eagles are working to finalize a trade that will send edge rusher Bryce Huff to San Francisco for a mid-round  pick. The trade cannot and would not be processed until after June 1. But both sides are working to make it happen, and Huff already has reworked his contract to help facilitate the trade. In San Francisco, Huff will be reunited with 49ers DC Robert Saleh, his former HC with the Jets.

images.name: Shedeur Sanders [608x342]
images.caption: Rookie Shedeur Sanders is one of four QBs in a competition to helm the Browns' offense.

images.name: David Njoku [608x342]
images.caption: TE David Njoku is looking to bounce back in 2025 after injuries limited him to 11 games last season.

images.name: Why Riddick says Shedeur starting Week 1 isn't ridiculous
images.caption: Louis Riddick and Dan Graziano analyze the possibility of Shedeur Sanders starting Week 1 for the Browns.

articles.description: The Browns have a lot of new faces on offense, including at coordinator and under center, as they reshape the unit.
articles.headline: Will Shedeur Sanders emerge at QB in new-look Browns offense?

images.name: Giants poke fun at each opponent in 2025 schedule reveal
images.caption: The New York Giants poke fun at each of their opponent's stereotype in a hilarious 2025 schedule reveal.

articles.description: This spring alone the Giants have heard from Eli Manning, Michael Strahan, Lawrence Taylor, Victor Cruz, Justin Tuck and Howard Cross, to name a few.
articles.headline: Giants calling on legends to help this year's team

images.name: Odafe Oweh [608x342]
images.caption: The Ravens drafted linebacker Odafe Oweh with the No. 31 pick in the 2021 draft.

images.name: Pat McAfee reacts to Derrick Henry's 2-year extension with Baltimore
images.caption: Pat McAfee and AJ Hawk give their thoughts on Derrick Henry signing a 2-year extension with the Ravens.

articles.description: After Baltimore's postseason loss to the Bills, Oweh looked to bulk up to become a more powerful pass rusher.
articles.headline: How playoff disappointment helped Ravens LB transform physique
